decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Mouawad-24BurlingtonRd-HP-SLP, Unnumbered Design and Access Statement, received 17/10/2013, Mouawad-24BurlingtonRd-HP-01 Revision D6, Mouawad-24BurlingtonRd-HP-02 Revision D6, Mouawad-24BurlingtonRd-HP-03 Revision D6, Mouawad-24BurlingtonRd-HP-04 Revision D6 (Existing Floor Plans), Mouawad-24BurlingtonRd-HP-05 Revision D6, Mouawad-24BurlingtonRd-HP-06 Revision D6, Mouawad-24BurlingtonRd-HP-07 Revision D6, Mouawad-24BurlingtonRd-HP-08 Revision D6, Mouawad-24BurlingtonRd-HP-10 Revision D6 (Proposed Plans), received 24/11/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the enlarged staircase hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing staircase.
description: Amendment to planning permission 00177/24/P3 to retain existing balcony and widen existing staircase to basement
